ygData.subject: Crossing the Rubicon
ygData.msgSnippet: The mess of parts that scattered the deck was a bit puzzling, but Inferno and Rampage quickly set to work welding peices together and placing each peice

Subject: Crossing the Rubicon
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: Windows AOL sub 82
From: JP3884@...

    The mess of parts that scattered the deck was a bit puzzling, but Inferno 
and Rampage quickly set to work welding peices together and placing each 
peice together. It would take a day or so, without stopping, to complete the 
task. But the sooner it was done, the better.

    Megatron wasnt an idiot. He knew how deep rooted revenge could be, and 
hate even more. Kitkat had shown both of these qualities when he had left her 
to die. Now, working together, he could sense it. It seemed with the arrival 
of this bot Apocolypse, the tides had turned. Yes.
    He made his way down into the holding compartments of the ship. His 
troops prefered it there, instead of upstairs. Entering the room he saw all 
of them, including Hell Beast's and Black Aracnia's troops.
    Making his way through the room he came to the far corner where Hell 
Beast reclined like a true Roman Governer. He was surprized that he wasnt 
chewing on some grapes. Now, there yes met.
    "And what are you doing down here, Megatron?" Hell Beast questioned with 
a bit of agitiation. He didnt like being walked in on while resting.
    Megatron sat down at the small pillowed area. "I do belive our host is 
going to betray us." He said getting right to the point.
    "Really? Without us she is just another small faction. I dont think she 
will be doing anything." The senator said.
    "Apocolypse, he is meeting with her now. I dont like it. Tell Aracnia to 
get here. Our council needs to have its first official meeting."

    Black Aracnia looked longingly at Quickstrike. It had been so long scince 
the two of them could be alone. She had never truly loved someone like this, 
but she now carried his-there-child. He was a good, strong, and smart bot. He 
would provide for her.
    "Tell me darling, whats troubling you?" She asked, placing her claw on 
his thigh, rubbing gently.
